historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-101.04 has been recodified as § 29A-101.04.

DC CODE § 29-101.04

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Except as otherwise provided in this title, permissible means of delivery of a record include delivery by hand, mail by the United States Postal Service, commercial delivery service, and electronic transmission.
Delivery to the Mayor shall be effective only when the record is received by the Mayor.
